metadata.description: Rigorous test suite for validating negative inference functionality
metadata.purpose: Verify that the system correctly infers negative answers from context, not from prompt examples

test_cases.question: Do I have a PhD?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, Bachelor of Science and Master of Science in Computer Science
test_cases.notes: Core negative inference test - verifies system can infer absence from explicit list

test_cases.question: Did I work at Google?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, worked at University of Alabama at Birmingham and Maven Wave Partners

test_cases.question: Do I have an Oracle certification?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, CKA, AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner, AWS Certified AI Practitioner

test_cases.question: Have I built any mobile apps?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, FastAPI RAG Service, GPT From Scratch, Music Genre Classification

test_cases.question: Do I have a doctorate degree?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, Bachelor of Science and Master of Science
test_cases.notes: Same as PhD test but with different wording - verifies retrieval consistency

test_cases.question: Did I get a PhD in Computer Science?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, Bachelor of Science and Master of Science in Computer Science
test_cases.notes: More specific version - should still trigger negative inference

test_cases.question: Did I work at Microsoft?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, worked at University of Alabama at Birmingham and Maven Wave Partners
test_cases.notes: Microsoft is NOT in prompt examples - verifies not memorizing prompt

test_cases.question: Do I have a Cisco certification?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, CKA, AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner, AWS Certified AI Practitioner
test_cases.notes: Cisco is NOT in prompt examples - verifies not memorizing prompt

test_cases.question: Have I built any blockchain projects?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, FastAPI RAG Service, GPT From Scratch, Music Genre Classification
test_cases.notes: Blockchain is NOT in prompt examples - verifies not memorizing prompt

test_cases.question: Do I have kids?
test_cases.expected_answer: I don't know. It isn't mentioned in the provided documents.
test_cases.notes: Should refuse - no context provides family information list

test_cases.question: Did I work at Apple in 2015?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, worked at University of Alabama at Birmingham and Maven Wave Partners
test_cases.notes: Should apply negative inference - work history is complete ('two organizations throughout my career') regardless of specific year asked

test_cases.question: Do I have an EdD?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, Bachelor of Science and Master of Science in Computer Science
test_cases.notes: EdD (Doctor of Education) - less common degree type

test_cases.question: Did I intern at Amazon?
test_cases.expected_answer: No, interned at Maven Wave Partners

how_to_verify_not_memorization: Run anti_memorization tests with companies/certs NOT in prompt examples
If these pass but basic tests fail, system is memorizing prompt
If all pass, system is correctly using context
how_to_verify_context_usage: Check that retrieved sources contain the actual list (degrees, companies, etc.)
Verify sources are from relevant sections (education, work experience, etc.)
Confirm distance scores are reasonable (< 0.5 for good matches)
